Package com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.search

Objects to search and calculate lexical statistics from an index (ex: found occurrences by facet)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BitsFromQuery
    A search giving results as bits.
    CollectorBits
    Collect found documents as a set of docids in a bitSet.
    Corpus
    This object handle information of a “corpus” : a set of docId in a lucene index.
    CorpusQuery
    Query with a document iterator backed on a BitSet (the corpus).
    Doc
    Tools to display a document
    DocHiliter
    Build a flatten version of a term vector for a document, to hilite some terms.
    FieldFacet
    A dedicated dictionary for facets, to allow similarity scores.
    FieldInt
    Retrieve all values of an int field, store it in docId order, calculate some stats..
    FieldRail
    Persistent storage of full sequence of all document search for a field.
    FieldText
    An object recording different stats for a lucene text field.
    FormEnum
    This object is build to collect list of forms with useful stats for semantic interpretations and score calculations.
    FormEnum.Bigram  
    HiliteFormatter
    Creates a formatted snippet from the top passages.
    Marker
    A light hiliter using a Lucene analyzer and a compiled automaton, designed for short texts (ex: show found words when searching in titles).
    Scale
    Handle data to display results as a chronology, according to subset of an index, given as a bitset.
    Scale.Tick
    A row of data for a crossing axis
    SimilarityChi2
    Implementation of a Chi2 Scoring with negative scores to get the most repulsed doc from a search.
    SimilarityChi2inv
    Implementation of a Chi2 Scoring with negative scores to get the most repulsed doc from a search.
    SimilarityG
    Implementation of a G-test Scoring with negative scores to get the most repulsed doc from a search.
    SimilarityGsimple
    Implementation of a G-test Scoring with negative scores to get the most repulsed doc from a search.
    SimilarityOccs  
    TermList
    An object to store lucene search with a frequency indice.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FormEnum.Order
    sort order
